activation.condition: When you use your entropic strike against a creature with the swarm defenses ability

description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.Dysu4F8licjEb2FY]{Vanguard Discipline}

When you use your @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.6Fuz5JTbJCBPynZd]{Entropic Strike (Su)} against a creature with the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.universal-creature-rules.Item.aLJuzmdGypXmboQG]{Swarm Defenses (Ex)} ability, you can deal half damage to the target instead of no damage. When you use your blast @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.Qy3l9fgoVaGLV7YD]{Entropic Attunement (Su)} to deal damage to multiple targets, it deals additional damage to creatures with the swarm defenses special ability as though the weapon affected all creatures in its area.
